name: SCP: The Round Table
description:
Disclaimer : This game is not multiplayer ! Even if we have concepts of players, they are all controlled by you.

SCP: The Round Table is a SCP game occurring in a unknown facility where you need to gather all the players together to activate this unknown round table power. But it seems that a containment breach has occurred meanwhile, and SCP-173 escaped !

Overview

At start you will be controlling the first player of the ten (10) you will need to guide. The map is semi-random generated, so you will be able to develop orientation techniques.

There are three (3) main zones in the map :

Working Zone : Where we find the personnel's offices

Containment Zone : Where we find SCPs such as SCP-173

Administration Zone : Where we find the entrance of the final room : The Round Table Room.

Players will spawn in the Working Zone and in the Containment Zone.

The goal of the game is to go as fast as possible in The Round Table Room without dying, and with everyone. If anyone dies, it's the end of the game !

The checkpoints between Containment Zone and Working Zone is unlocked only at a specific power level.

The Round Table Room will be only accessible if everyone is grouped physically in one place : you will need to raise the power bar to it's maximum

Powers

The Power Bar shows your current power level. Gather together with the other players to gain up in power.

You will gradually unlock powers that will make your task easier, such as opening doors to The Portals SCP, which is, like his name suggests, a portal that make a fast bridge between zones.

Controls

All the game's assets, including ones imported from SCP: Containment Breach, and excluding the SCP-173 model, are all licensed in the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License.

This game is an entry to the Brackeys 2021.1 game jam.
